features.description: Command palette (Cmd+K) for quick navigation and actions
acceptanceCriteria: Opens with Cmd+K or Ctrl+K shortcut
Fuzzy search across features and commands
evidenceLinks: uses cmdk library for fuzzy search
features.notes: Implementation: Use cmdk library or build custom. Index features, navigation routes, and actions. Edge cases: Handle no results gracefully, show recent actions. Dependencies: None. Context: Power user feature - dramatically speeds up navigation. Gotchas: Prevent browser default behavior for Cmd+K, handle focus trap correctly.

features.description: Keyboard shortcuts for common actions with help overlay
acceptanceCriteria: Shortcuts work globally except in inputs
features.notes: Implementation: Use useHotkeys hook or custom event listener. Create KeyboardShortcutsProvider context. Edge cases: Disable shortcuts when modal open or input focused. Dependencies: F079 for consistent pattern. Context: Vim-style navigation for power users. Gotchas: Different shortcuts for Mac vs Windows, show correct modifier in UI.

features.description: Drag-and-drop feature prioritization in Spec Explorer
acceptanceCriteria: Features can be dragged to reorder within priority group
Optimistic UI update with API sync
features.notes: Implementation: Use dnd-kit or react-beautiful-dnd. Store order in features.json or separate ordering field. Edge cases: Handle concurrent edits, revert on API failure. Dependencies: F061 (feature CRUD API). Context: Visual project management like Trello. Gotchas: Accessibility - need keyboard alternatives for drag operations.

features.description: Bulk actions toolbar for multiple feature selection
acceptanceCriteria: Checkbox on each feature row for selection
Floating toolbar appears with selection count
features.notes: Implementation: Track selected feature IDs in state. Show ActionBar component when selection.length > 0. Edge cases: Handle mixed statuses (some already verified). Dependencies: F062 (status transitions API). Context: Batch operations save time on large projects. Gotchas: Confirm destructive actions, handle partial failures in batch.

features.description: Microinteractions and loading states with skeleton screens
acceptanceCriteria: Skeleton loaders for cards and lists
features.notes: Implementation: Create Skeleton component with shimmer animation using CSS. Use framer-motion for complex animations. Edge cases: Respect prefers-reduced-motion. Dependencies: None. Context: Polish that makes app feel responsive and professional. Gotchas: Don't over-animate - subtle is better, skeleton should match actual content layout.

features.description: Feature timeline visualization showing project history
features.notes: Implementation: Custom timeline component with flex layout. Query git commits and session history for events. Edge cases: Handle sparse timelines with few events. Dependencies: F075 (git history API). Context: Project retrospective and progress tracking. Gotchas: Performance with many events - virtualize or paginate.

features.description: Feature dependency graph visualization
acceptanceCriteria: Interactive node graph showing feature relationships
features.notes: Implementation: Use react-flow or d3-force for graph layout. Parse notes field for dependency mentions. Edge cases: Handle circular dependencies, orphan nodes. Dependencies: F068 (feature details). Context: Visualize complex project structure and blockers. Gotchas: Layout algorithm can be expensive - cache results, limit visible nodes.

features.description: Quick action buttons on feature cards (hover reveal)
acceptanceCriteria: Buttons positioned to avoid accidental clicks
features.notes: Implementation: Use group/group-hover Tailwind pattern. Position actions in top-right corner. Edge cases: Touch devices need different trigger (long press or always visible). Dependencies: F062 (status API). Context: Reduce clicks needed for common operations. Gotchas: Don't obstruct feature title or description on hover.

features.description: Collapsible sidebar with icon-only mode
acceptanceCriteria: Toggle button collapses sidebar to icons only
Tooltips show labels in collapsed mode
features.notes: Implementation: Store collapsed state in localStorage. Use Tailwind w-64 vs w-16 with transition. Edge cases: Handle mobile where sidebar is overlay. Dependencies: F073 (navigation sidebar). Context: More screen real estate for content. Gotchas: Icons must be recognizable without labels, test with users.

features.description: Real-time collaboration indicators showing active users
acceptanceCriteria: Tooltip shows user name and current view
features.notes: Implementation: Extend WebSocket to broadcast user presence. Store user sessions server-side. Edge cases: Handle disconnections gracefully, show recently left users briefly. Dependencies: F065 (WebSocket). Context: Team awareness for collaborative editing. Gotchas: Privacy considerations - make presence opt-in.

features.description: Kanban board view for features by status
acceptanceCriteria: Drag features between columns to change status
Card shows ID and truncated description
features.notes: Implementation: Reuse existing feature list data, render in column layout. Integrate with dnd-kit for drag-drop. Edge cases: Many features in one column - add scrolling. Dependencies: F081 (drag-drop), F067 (spec explorer). Context: Familiar Kanban UX from Trello/Jira. Gotchas: Keyboard accessibility for column navigation.

features.description: Customizable dashboard widgets with drag-drop layout
acceptanceCriteria: Users can add/remove widgets from dashboard
Widgets can be resized and repositioned
Default widgets: progress ring chart and priority features
features.notes: Implementation: Use react-grid-layout for dashboard layout. Define widget registry with component and default size. Edge cases: Reset to default option if layout breaks. Dependencies: F077, F078 (charts). Context: Personalized workspace like Notion dashboards. Gotchas: Handle window resize and mobile layouts differently.

features.description: Markdown preview and editor for feature notes
acceptanceCriteria: Live preview pane shows rendered markdown
features.notes: Implementation: Use react-markdown with remark-gfm for GFM support. Prism or highlight.js for code. Edge cases: Sanitize HTML to prevent XSS. Dependencies: F068 (task viewer). Context: Rich documentation for complex features. Gotchas: Performance with large documents - debounce preview updates.

features.description: Theme customization with color accent picker
acceptanceCriteria: Theme saves to localStorage and syncs to config
features.notes: Implementation: Use CSS custom properties (--primary, --accent). Create color palette generator from base color. Edge cases: Ensure contrast ratios meet WCAG AA. Dependencies: F070 (config editor). Context: Brand customization for different projects. Gotchas: Test readability with all color combinations.

features.description: Feature card expanded view with acceptance criteria checklist
acceptanceCriteria: Click expands card inline showing full details
Acceptance criteria rendered as interactive checklist
Collapse button or click outside closes
features.notes: Implementation: Animate height transition with framer-motion or CSS grid. Store checked criteria in feature verifiedBy field or separate. Edge cases: Very long criteria lists need scroll. Dependencies: F067 (spec explorer). Context: In-place editing reduces navigation. Gotchas: Handle keyboard navigation within expanded card.

features.description: Accessibility improvements with ARIA labels and focus management
acceptanceCriteria: All interactive elements have ARIA labels
Focus ring visible on keyboard navigation
Screen reader announcements for status changes
features.notes: Implementation: Add aria-label, aria-describedby, role attributes. Use focus-visible for focus rings. Edge cases: Test with actual screen readers (VoiceOver NVDA). Dependencies: None - applies across all components. Context: Inclusive design and legal compliance. Gotchas: Live regions for dynamic content updates.

features.description: Mobile-optimized touch gestures and responsive layout
acceptanceCriteria: Swipe gestures on feature cards for quick actions
Responsive grid adjusts to screen width
features.notes: Implementation: Use touch event handlers or react-swipeable. Media queries for breakpoints. Edge cases: Hybrid touch/mouse devices. Dependencies: None - applies across components. Context: First-class mobile experience. Gotchas: Test on actual devices, not just responsive mode.

features.description: Session timer widget showing elapsed time and activity
acceptanceCriteria: Displays elapsed time since session start
Updates every second when session active
features.notes: Implementation: Use setInterval for timer, track last activity timestamp. Store in React context or Zustand. Edge cases: Browser tab hidden - use visibilitychange API. Dependencies: F072 (session control). Context: Time awareness for focused work sessions. Gotchas: Don't drain battery - reduce update frequency when hidden.

features.description: Recent activity feed with live updates on dashboard
acceptanceCriteria: Shows last 10 activities (feature changes and commits)
features.notes: Implementation: Aggregate from features and git commits APIs. Use WebSocket for push updates. Edge cases: Handle high activity volume - debounce or batch. Dependencies: F065 (WebSocket), F075 (commits API). Context: At-a-glance project pulse. Gotchas: Timezone handling for timestamps.

features.description: Inline feature quick-add from anywhere in the app
acceptanceCriteria: Category and priority default from context
features.notes: Implementation: Create FloatingActionButton component with mini form. Use React Portal for overlay. Edge cases: Form validation, handle rapid submissions. Dependencies: F071 (add feature form), F061 (API). Context: Capture ideas quickly without navigation. Gotchas: Position must not block important content.

features.description: Empty state illustrations and onboarding hints
acceptanceCriteria: First-time user hints with dismiss option
Getting started checklist for new projects
features.notes: Implementation: Create EmptyState component with SVG illustrations. Store onboarding progress in localStorage. Edge cases: Don't show hints after user has used feature. Dependencies: None. Context: Friendly first impression, reduce confusion. Gotchas: Keep illustrations lightweight (SVG not PNG), respect prefers-reduced-motion.

features.description: Feature search with advanced filters and saved queries
acceptanceCriteria: Full-text search across all feature fields
Save and name custom filter combinations
features.notes: Implementation: Combine existing filters with localStorage for saved queries. Add chips UI component. Edge cases: Handle very long saved query names. Dependencies: F067 (spec explorer). Context: Power users need fast access to specific features. Gotchas: Debounce search input to avoid excessive filtering.

features.description: Confirmation dialogs with undo option for destructive actions
acceptanceCriteria: Delete and block actions show confirmation modal
Undo option available for 5 seconds after action
Clear visual warning for destructive actions
Keyboard accessible (Enter confirms and Escape cancels)
features.notes: Implementation: Create ConfirmDialog component with timer for undo. Use optimistic updates with rollback. Edge cases: Handle multiple undo requests. Dependencies: F074 (toast system). Context: Prevent accidental data loss. Gotchas: Undo must actually work - queue the real deletion.

features.description: Breadcrumb navigation showing current location hierarchy
acceptanceCriteria: Shows path like Dashboard > Specs > F001
Each segment is clickable for navigation
features.notes: Implementation: Parse current route and build breadcrumb array. Use react-router useLocation. Edge cases: Handle deep nesting (more than 3 levels). Dependencies: F073 (navigation). Context: Orientation in app structure. Gotchas: Don't show single breadcrumb (just current page).

features.description: Print-friendly view for feature reports
acceptanceCriteria: Print button generates clean printable view
features.notes: Implementation: Add @media print styles. Create PrintableReport component with simplified layout. Edge cases: Handle very long notes (page overflow). Dependencies: F026 (report command). Context: Share progress with stakeholders offline. Gotchas: Test in multiple browsers - print CSS varies.

features.description: Offline support with service worker caching
acceptanceCriteria: Cached data displayed with offline indicator
Queue actions for sync when online
Clear offline data option in settings
features.notes: Implementation: Use Vite PWA plugin or workbox. Cache API responses in IndexedDB. Edge cases: Handle stale data conflicts on reconnect. Dependencies: F065 (WebSocket - needs reconnection logic). Context: Reliability for users with spotty connections. Gotchas: Service worker updates can be tricky - implement update notification.
